definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Circadian activity and antipredation behaviour of Agkistrodon qinlingensis are observed.
sentences.chinese: 本文观察研究了秦岭蝮蛇的活动节律和反捕行为。

sentences.english: These rhythmic waves of muscular relaxation and contraction are called peristalsis .
sentences.chinese: 这种肌肉舒张和收缩的有节律波动称为蠕动。

sentences.english: An imbalance between Schumann and geomagnetic waves disrupts biorhythms.
sentences.chinese: 舒曼波和地磁波之间的不平衡干扰了生理节律。

sentences.english: Reproduction of Tibetan monkeys troop in Yulingkeng of Huangshan Mountain wasseasonality, and it belongs to the birth rhythm pattern.
sentences.chinese: 黄山短尾猴鱼鳞坑群为季节性繁殖，属产仔节律型。

sentences.english: This is a phrase numerous martial arts masters wrote about in the books I have read.
sentences.chinese: 我读过的书中许多武术大师都提到过节律这个词。

sentences.english: The environmental light-dark cycle acts as one of the most potent influencing agents of circadian system.
sentences.chinese: 光照周期是影响昼夜节律系统的主要环境因子。

sentences.english: Circadian rhythms show persistent, stable periodicities of about 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 昼夜节律表现出大约24小时的连续而稳定的周期性。

sentences.english: Now, it has been applied to the researches of biorhythm in Beijing Univsersity of Traditional Chinese Medicine and Pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 本系统已应用于北京中医药大学的生命节律研究。

sentences.english: Increasingly, researchers are seeing bipolar disorder as a disturbance of rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 研究者日益将双相情感障碍视为节律扰乱。

sentences.english: This gene is critical to circadian rhythms.
sentences.chinese: 这种基因因其昼夜节律而显得至为重要。

sentences.english: The moths fly with a clear day-night rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 飞翔活动有明显的昼夜节律。

sentences.english: When they actually perform the drumming display at the nest, it does seem to have a rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 当他们在巢上实际敲击展示时，听起来是有节律的。

sentences.english: Terfenadine and astemizole may increase the risk of abnormal heart rhythms.
sentences.chinese: 特非那丁和息斯敏可能增加风险的异常心脏节律。

sentences.english: The longer you read it,the more you get into the rhythm and mood.
sentences.chinese: 你读的时间越长，对作品的节律和情感就领会得越深。

sentences.english: The ablations disrupt the atria's abnormal electrical activity and normalize heart rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 消融扰乱了心房异常电活动并使心脏节律恢复正常。

sentences.english: Biorhythm is one of the most common phenomena in nature.
sentences.chinese: 生物节律是自然界普遍存在的一种生命现象。

pinyin: zi4 zhu3 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3

definition: sleep/to sleep/(computing) to enter sleep mode
